price: 85. Tango alobaki na tata waye тре bato naye: Bozali kobondela nini?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
